WebsocketTokenController.websocketHostHi: A websocket server that the module will connect to
WebsocketTokenController.websocketPortHi: The port of the websocket that the module will connect to
WebsocketTokenController.websocketPathHi: The path of the websocket that the module will connect to
WebsocketTokenController.cameraControlHi: This changes the camera behavior when tokens move
WebsocketTokenController.cameraControl.f: Automatic (focus all active player tokens on scene)
WebsocketTokenController.moduleEnabledHi: Enables the module for this browser
WebsocketTokenController.Notifications.E: An error ocurred, look at the log for more information
WebsocketTokenController.Notifications.C: Connected to websocket closed, attempting to reconnect in 5 seconds...
